original_text: The Teacher was wise man. He also taught the people to understand things. He studied many proverbs and he wrote them down carefully. The Teacher was wise man. He also taught the people to understand things. He studied many proverbs and he wrote them down carefully.
korean_text: 전도자는 지혜자이어서 여전히 백성에게 지식을 가르쳤고 또 깊이 생각하고 연구하여 잠언을 많이 지었으며

sentences.original_text: and he wrote them down carefully
